concept.title: Assigning Payment Types to Suppliers and Resellers

section.p: You are responsible for setting up the payment types that suppliers and resellers can offer to their customers. By default, suppliers and resellers can allow customers to pay on invoice so that they can subscribe to a service that is not free of charge.

p.b: To set the payment types for a supplier or reseller:

section.p: In the administration portal, choose Manage organization in the Operation menu. For detailed step-by-step instructions, refer to the online help.
